Detailed Description

This concrete class represents a random search training algorithm for an objective functional of a multilayer perceptron.

See also:
TrainingAlgorithm.

Definition at line 30 of file RandomSearch.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Flood::RandomSearch::RandomSearch ( ObjectiveFunctional *  newObjectiveFunctional  ) 

General constructor. It creates a random search training algorithm object associated to an objective functional object. It also initializes the class members to their default values:

Training parameters:

  • Minimum value of free parameters: -1.0.
  • Maximum value of free parameters: 1.0.

Stopping criteria:

  • Evaluation goal: -1.0e99.
  • Maximum time: 1.0e6.
  • Maximum number of epochs: 100.

User stuff:

  • Display: true.
  • Display period: 25.

Parameters:
newObjectiveFunctional Pointer to an objective functional object.

Definition at line 55 of file RandomSearch.cpp.

References Flood::TrainingAlgorithm::displayPeriod, Flood::TrainingAlgorithm::evaluationGoal, Flood::ObjectiveFunctional::getMultilayerPerceptron(), Flood::MultilayerPerceptron::getNumberOfFreeParameters(), Flood::TrainingAlgorithm::maximumNumberOfEpochs, Flood::TrainingAlgorithm::maximumTime, maximumValueOfFreeParameters, minimumValueOfFreeParameters, and Flood::TrainingAlgorithm::objectiveFunctional.

Flood::RandomSearch::RandomSearch ( void   ) 

Default constructor. It creates a random search training algorithm object not associated to any objective functional object. It also initializes the class members to their default values:

Stopping criteria:

  • Evaluation goal: -1.0e99.
  • Maximum training time: 1.0e6.
  • Maximum number of epochs: 100.

User stuff:

  • Display: true.
  • Display period: 10.

References maximumValueOfFreeParameters.

Matrix< double > Flood::RandomSearch::getMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters ( void   ) 

This method returns a single matrix containing the maximum and minimum values for all the free parameters in the search hypercube. The first row contains the minimum value of the free parameters. The first row contains the maximum value of the free parameters.

See also:
getMinimumValueOfFreeParameters(void).

getMaximumValueOfFreeParameters(void).

void Flood::RandomSearch::setMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters ( Matrix< double >  newMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters  ) 

This method sets both the minimum and the maximum values for all the free parameters in the search hypercube from a single matrix. The first row must contain the minimum values for the free parameters. The second row must contain the maximum values for the free parameters.

Parameters:
newMinimumAndMaximumValuesOfFreeParameters Set of minimum and maximum values for the free parameters of the neural network.
See also:
setMinimumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>).

setMaximumValueOfFreeParameters(Vector<double>).

void Flood::RandomSearch::train ( void   )  [virtual]

This method trains a multilayer perceptron with an associated objective function according to the random search training algorithm. Training occurs according to the training parameters.

Implements Flood::TrainingAlgorithm.

void Flood::RandomSearch::print ( void   )  [virtual]

This method prints to the screen the training parameters, the stopping criteria and other user stuff concerning the random search object:

Training parameters:

  • Minimum value of free parameters.
  • Maximum value of free parameters.

Stopping criteria:

  • Evaluation goal.
  • Maximum time.
  • Maximum number of epochs.

User stuff:

  • Display.
  • Display period.

void Flood::RandomSearch::resizeTrainingHistory ( int  newSize  ) 

This method resizes the vectors or matrices containing training history information to a new size:

  • Elapsed time history vector.
  • Free parameters history matrix.
  • Free parameters norm history vector.
  • Evaluation history vector.

Parameters:
newSize Size of training history.
